resources.string: Welcome to Ben\'s Phone Bill Application

READ ME

 This application is to help you manage 
 phone bills from customers given their name. 
 
 The Main screen will display any available 
 phone bill with the customer's name 
 and the number of phone call in the bill. 
 
 Tapping on each phone bill will briefly 
 display the detail of that phone bill 
 including the phone calls contained in it. 
 
 From Main screen, you can navigate to add 
 a phone call, which will also automatically 
 add a phone bill for that customer if the 
 phone bill does not exist yet. 
 
 Phone numbers will be in the format of: 
 ###-###-#### (eg. 503-111-2222) 
 Any time field will be in the format of: 
 mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm am/pm (eg. 11/12/2022 10:30 am 
 or 8/9/2022 9:05 pm) 
 
 The Search will help you search for all 
 the phone calls from any particular 
 existing customer that has the begin time 
 between a certain range.
